home.meta_title_template: %s - An Open-source Platform for Decentralized Applications
home.summary: @:ellaism is an open-source platform for decentralized applications.

pitch.content: Ellaism is an {evm}-based network with {wasm} enabled. We encourage developers, educators, and enthusiasts to test WebAssembly scripting on our testnet.

card_1.title: EVM and Wasm Enabled
card_1.content: Ellaism enabled WebAssembly on August 4th, 2018, giving Developers the choice to use the EVM or gain experience running Wasm smart contracts in a production environment.

card_2.title: Transparency and Stability
card_2.content: In cryptocurrency, transparency brings trust. The Core team hold strong transparency in its financial and development process. Our strong principles also build a stable platform.

card_3.title: Community Driven
card_3.content: We have a welcoming community and a donation-based development process. You have full control over the cryptocurrency you use, and can always choose a team you trust to develop @:(ellaism).

testnet.title: @:ellaism Testnet
testnet.subtitle: Test your DApps before deploying to mainnet.

donate.title: Donate to @:ellaism
donate.subtitle: @:ellaism is a 100% community-sponsored project.
donate.intro: In an effort to maintain a high level of transparency for the @:ellaism_project, donated funds are held in multisignature (multisig) wallets. The multisig wallets for the development and community funds can receive inbound transactions as normal. However, to execute transactions, it requires multiple, unrelated entities to sign the transaction.
donate.governance_note: The development and community funds are not intended to be utilized as a governance protocol. The understood purpose of these funds is to serve the community-driven goals of the @:(ellaism_project).
donate.donation_intro: @:ellaism is a 100% community-sponsored project. If you want to join our efforts, the easiest thing you can do is support the project financially.
donate.development_fund_intro: The development fund is currently used to support the following initiatives:
donate.community_fund_intro: The community fund is currently used to support the following initiatives:

wallet.subtitle: Select a wallet to store your @:ellaism so you can start interacting with the network.

statement.title: Statement
statement.content: @:ellaism is not funded nor controlled by any entity, it is an open-source platform for decentralized applications.
